hadiths.text: Jabir narrated:"The Prophet dispatched me for something he needed. I came to him while he was performing Salat on his mount, heading east, he made the prostrations lower than the bowing

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الصَّلاَةِ عَلَى الدَّابَّةِ حَيْثُمَا تَوَجَّهَتْ بِهِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Salat On A Beast Whichever Direction It Is Facing
